description: Empire Clock in the Form of a Vase on a footed pedestal, porcelain with gold matte and burnished glaze and matte black glaze, France XIX c. In four pieces plus the works. The top piece (the vase neck) bolts to the body -the works must be removed to do so. The body and vase foot bolt to the pedestal. The works are removed by removing two pins (at 3 and 9) and pulling the clock slowly forward. Enameled face does not have a glass over it. No keys.  The clock is not signed.
title: Empire Clock in the Form of a Vase
